title: Renewed Pixel 2Xl Warranty
content:
Hey Guys,
I bought a Renewed PIXEL  2XL from amazon on 11/03/2020 , it was delivered on 16/03/2020.
It was beautiful one, i was very happy with the purchase. 
Ironically yesterday was the last day of warranty & around 9PM the screen started to flicker on the left side & i immediately contacted Amazon. They were unable to trace the sellers number & asked to contact GOOGLE team.

 I have the Invoice & the seller seems to be LEGIT . I Tracked him through GST number but i could not find his contact details & amazon is Clueless as USUAL  

So will google consider this as IN warranty product or no ?

Please Guide

Thanks 
Sravan
